page.title: 04VETS LIFE IN KIRKBY
page.content: The main categories of animals which form the work of the local vet are {cows and sheep,}small animals form only 10% of the work.There has been a change in attitude towards vets.Ten years ago they were only called in serious cases,there was a very low rate of success.Today the emphasis of the economically_minded farmer is to {prevent serious cases}developing and so the vet is consulted at an early stage and almost forms a{partnership with the farmer to prevent serious illness.there has been no change in pet ownership over the last ten years.The major problem vets face in rural areas is{financial,}because of the constant,heavy stream of operations on small animals. Farmers recognise the economic value of the vet.; pet owners do not always do so.
